name: Accomplished Automaton
oracle_text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: Was it just lonely, or was some form of evolution inevitable?

name: Acrobatic Maneuver
oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Renegades find ever more creative ways to work around the Consulate's aether regulations.

name: Aether Theorist
oracle_text:
When Aether Theorist enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
{T}, Pay {E}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Aether Tradewinds
oracle_text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: Consulate engineers have developed safe methods of harvesting aether, but renegades aren't always so careful.

name: Ambitious Aetherborn
oracle_text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: Aetherborn who are unwilling to accept the decomposition of their bodies invent ways to preserve and augment themselves.

name: Appetite for the Unnatural
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I'd just let the monkey have it if I were you. You can make another, but the same can't be said of your fingers."
—Turni, Greenwheel groundskeeper

name: Aradara Express
oracle_text:
Menace
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text: It glides around the city, a sublime combination of elegance and utility.

name: Attune with Aether
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
flavor_text: "I've never seen a world where aether weaves through every aspect of nature."

name: Aviary Mechanic
oracle_text: When Aviary Mechanic enters the battlefield, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Pilots take crippled skyships to the Aviaries, trusting Ghirapur's most talented mechanics to get them back into the air.

name: Bastion Mastodon
oracle_text: {W}: Bastion Mastodon gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Consulate's automaton bank contains only the most impressive specimens.

name: Built to Last
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: Consulate-built automatons have a lifetime warranty.

name: Built to Smash
oracle_text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Free from Consulate regulations, renegade-built automatons push performance to the limit.

name: Cathartic Reunion
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
oracle_text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor_text: "This one's for my mom, and this one's for me."

name: Cogworker's Puzzleknot
oracle_text:
When Cogworker's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
{1}{W}, Sacrifice Cogworker's Puzzleknot: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

name: Commencement of Festivities
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.
flavor_text: Never before have there been so many brilliant minds and wondrous inventions in one place. Denizens from every corner of Kaladesh will flock to the once-in-a-lifetime Inventors' Fair.

name: Consulate Skygate
oracle_text:
Defender
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: All skyships entering or leaving the fairgrounds must pass through the security checkpoint.

name: Cowl Prowler
flavor_text: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost—occasionally permanently—in the city's wildest greenbelt.

name: Curio Vendor
flavor_text: "Step right up! Try your hand! It'll thrill the senses and boggle the mind!"

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text: Most came to Ghirapur for the Fair. Gremlins came for the feast.

name: Dhund Operative
oracle_text: As long as you control an artifact, Dhund Operative gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch.
flavor_text: Baral's spies always have the latest technology.

name: Die Young
oracle_text: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. The creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each {E} paid this way.
flavor_text: "When the time comes, let go. Nothing lasts forever."

name: Dramatic Reversal
oracle_text: Untap all nonland permanents you control.
flavor_text:
"Nobody asked you to butt in, Jace. But thanks."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Dukhara Peafowl
oracle_text: {U}: Dukhara Peafowl gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Elegant filigree birds perch along the eleven bridges that cross Canal Dukhara.

name: Dukhara Scavenger
oracle_text: When Dukhara Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may put target artifact or creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text: The teeth marks add character.

name: Eager Construct
oracle_text: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.

name: Eddytrail Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Eddytrail Hawk enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Eddytrail Hawk attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Failed Inspection
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: The most dangerous thing an artificer can do is believe an invention is perfect.

name: Fireforger's Puzzleknot
oracle_text:
When Fireforger's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Fireforger's Puzzleknot: It deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Flame Lash
oracle_text: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "This is just my warm-up."

name: Fortuitous Find
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: An aetherborn wastes neither time nor treasure.

name: Foundry Screecher
oracle_text:
Flying
Foundry Screecher gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.
flavor_text:
"My creations still can't match the dive speed of those floppy-winged mammals. Maybe I should enter one of them in the Fair."
—Viprikti, thopterist

name: Fragmentize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 4 or less.
flavor_text:
"Too much friction on your bearings, your countersinking is inconsistent, and there are lines in your casting. Dispose of it, and begin again."
—Dovin Baan

name: Gearseeker Serpent
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
{5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Its collection is vast, yet each ship has a special place in its heart.

name: Giant Spectacle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace.
flavor_text: The giant-decorating contest at the migration festival is a tradition that may have started as a dare.

name: Glassblower's Puzzleknot
oracle_text:
When Glassblower's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, scry 2, then you get {E}{E}. (You get two energy counters. To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{2}{U}, Sacrifice Glassblower's Puzzleknot: Scry 2, then you get {E}{E}.

name: Glint-Sleeve Artisan
oracle_text: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: "Shine bright, bolts tight."

name: Herald of the Fair
oracle_text: When Herald of the Fair enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Welcome, one and all! Right this way! Open your eyes, your ears, and your imaginations to the wonders of the Inventors' Fair!"

name: Highspire Artisan
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

name: Hightide Hermit
oracle_text:
Defender
When Hightide Hermit enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}: Hightide Hermit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

name: Hijack
oracle_text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Whoa there. Easy. We're just going to take a little detour."

name: Hunt the Weak
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Natural evolution is often at odds with industrial progress.

name: Impeccable Timing
oracle_text: Impeccable Timing deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: When Baral constructed his trap for Chandra, he did not account for the arrival of an enormous leonin wielding a twin-headed axe.

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: One dwarf on a build team ensures competence. All dwarves on the team ensures brilliance.

name: Inventor's Goggles
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+2.
Whenever an Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Inventor's Goggles to it.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Kujar Seedsculptor
oracle_text: When Kujar Seedsculptor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Every leaf, tree, and building in Kujar has been placed to achieve maximum harmony, in accordance with the elvish philosophy known as the Great Conduit.

name: Larger Than Life
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They say Head Judge Tezzeret will be reviewing every invention at the Fair. I made sure to build something that will stand out."
—Jehvani, Vahadar artificer

name: Lawless Broker
oracle_text: When Lawless Broker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Kaladesh's illicit marketplaces are known as "night markets," but if you know who to ask, you can find what you're looking for at any time of the day.

name: Live Fast
oracle_text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, and get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
flavor_text: "When you have the chance, take it. Laugh, sing, dance. Don't allow the night to end."

name: Malfunction
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
When Malfunction enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent.
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: "They don't make them like they used to."

name: Maulfist Squad
oracle_text:
Menace
Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: "Nice invention there. Looks real fragile."

name: Metalspinner's Puzzleknot
oracle_text:
When Metalspinner's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Metalspinner's Puzzleknot: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

name: Narnam Cobra
oracle_text: {G}: Narnam Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Some say tales of the Narnam greenhouse are told to scare the children, but every tale grows from a seed of truth.

name: Night Market Lookout
oracle_text: Whenever Night Market Lookout becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: The Consulate rarely cracks the coded announcement of a night market's location before dawn, and enforcers are taken care of if they wander too close.

name: Nimble Innovator
oracle_text: When Nimble Innovator enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "A failure is simply another opportunity for improvement. Just wait until you see what I come up with next."

name: Ninth Bridge Patrol
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ninth Bridge Patrol.
flavor_text: The Consulate keeps watch at each of the eleven bridges to ensure that the market remains a haven for commerce, not for con artists.

name: Ornamental Courage
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Inspired by the thorns and brambles of the untamed wilds, elvish armor is both beautiful and formidable.

name: Peema Outrider
oracle_text:
Trample
Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: Connected as artificer and invention, bonded as rider and steed.

name: Prakhata Club Security
flavor_text: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

name: Prakhata Pillar-Bug
oracle_text: {B}: Prakhata Pillar-Bug gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Not a mote of dust escapes the dutiful cleaners that keep the exclusive Prakhata Club immaculate.

name: Pressure Point
oracle_text:
Tap target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Everything has an off switch.

name: Propeller Pioneer
oracle_text:
Flying
Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)
flavor_text: "The sky isn't the limit. It's the starting point."

name: Reckless Fireweaver
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

name: Renegade Freighter
oracle_text:
Whenever Renegade Freighter attacks, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Renegade Tactics
oracle_text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Nothing against you. It's just that waiting for Consulate clearance was never really my thing."

name: Revoke Privileges
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles.
flavor_text: "By order of Consulate Mandate 482, I am required to detain you, citizen."

name: Revolutionary Rebuff
oracle_text: Counter target nonartifact spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: By the time a Consulate sanction becomes official, the renegade quicksmiths have already found a way to circumvent it.

name: Riparian Tiger
oracle_text:
Trample
When Riparian Tiger enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Riparian Tiger attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Ruinous Gremlin
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Ruinous Gremlin: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: City officials once sent twenty gleaming automatons to exterminate a nest of gremlins. They soon saw the error of their ways.

name: Rush of Vitality
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage dealt by that creature also causes its controller to gain that much life, and it can't be destroyed by damage or effects that say "destroy.")
flavor_text: Short lives lead to forbidden choices.

name: Sage of Shaila's Claim
oracle_text: When Sage of Shaila's Claim enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
flavor_text: Even now, Shaila's descendants proudly occupy the greenway that she refused to relinquish to the Consulate.

name: Salivating Gremlins
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Salivating Gremlins gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: If an elf can dream it, a dwarf can build it, and a gremlin can eat it.

name: Select for Inspection
oracle_text: Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Self-Assembler
oracle_text: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: It sees itself in all of its creations.

name: Sky Skiff
oracle_text:
Flying
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Skyswirl Harrier
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The great birds dive through the sky, wings skimming the aether streams, to fall upon their unsuspecting prey.

name: Spireside Infiltrator
oracle_text: Whenever Spireside Infiltrator becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "The Consulate promised that we would all have access to aether. I'm just keeping them honest."

name: Spontaneous Artist
oracle_text:
When Spontaneous Artist enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter).
Pay {E}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Graffiti of the "leaking spire" symbol is found wherever the renegades have been.

name: Stone Quarry
oracle_text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: The Inventors' Renaissance came on the heels of the Great Aether Boom, hiking demand for raw materials of every kind.

name: Subtle Strike
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: Renegades do some of their best work right under the Consulate's nose.

name: Take Down
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Take Down deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
• Take Down deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text: The drake flew true. The arrow flew truer.

name: Tasseled Dromedary
flavor_text: There is no dress code for the Inventors' Fair, but you'll be hard-pressed to find anyone or anything not done up in their finest.

name: Terrain Elemental
flavor_text:
"You tread upon the land all the time, yet you seem dismayed when it moves to step on you."
—Nissa Revane

name: Terror of the Fairgrounds
flavor_text:
"Consider this a high alert, people. Permission to destroy on sight. Either we take it down or it'll take down the Fair."
—Pav, gremlin watch

name: Tezzeret's Ambition
oracle_text: Draw three cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.
flavor_text: "To achieve what none have achieved before, one must dare what none have dared before."

name: Thriving Grubs
oracle_text:
When Thriving Grubs enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Some passengers ride without tickets.

name: Thriving Ibex
oracle_text:
When Thriving Ibex enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Ibex attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Textiles at the Inventors' Fair feature threads from every corner of Kaladesh.

name: Thriving Rats
oracle_text:
When Thriving Rats enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Rats attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: In Ghirapur, even the lowliest residents live in lavish surroundings.

name: Thriving Rhino
oracle_text:
When Thriving Rhino enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Rhino attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: As unpredictable as aether, and just as hard to contain.

name: Thriving Turtle
oracle_text:
When Thriving Turtle enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Turtle attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Aether shapes everything on Kaladesh, from the sky to the sea.

name: Tidy Conclusion
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You gain 1 life for each artifact you control.
flavor_text: Aetherborn patrons use any means necessary to secure victory for their protégés.

name: Torch Gauntlet
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text:
"Good morning, children. Please open your aether valves and ignite your gauntlets."
—Rakib, Ghirapur schoolteacher

name: Vedalken Blademaster
oracle_text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Vedalken have six thin, agile fingers on each hand, giving them unparalleled dexterity.

name: Wayward Giant
oracle_text: Menace
flavor_text:
"The giants follow the flow of aether, and twice a year it leads them through here. Lesson learned. More clearance is needed."
—Sram, senior edificer

name: Weldfast Monitor
oracle_text: {R}: Weldfast Monitor gains menace until end of turn.
flavor_text: The avant-garde among Ghirapur's inventors disregard the Consulate's safety standards completely.

name: Weldfast Wingsmith
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Weldfast Wingsmith gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Airships are too confining. If I'm in the sky, I want to feel the wind in my hair and taste the aether."

name: Welding Sparks
oracle_text: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.
flavor_text:
"The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames."
—Pia Nalaar

name: Wild Wanderer
oracle_text: When Wild Wanderer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "We all began in nature, and nature is where we belong."

name: Wily Bandar
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Wily Bandar gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: Part feline, part primate, all trouble.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Drakes prowl the skies of Kaladesh, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.

name: Woodweaver's Puzzleknot
oracle_text:
When Woodweaver's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).
{2}{G}, Sacrifice Woodweaver's Puzzleknot: You gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E}.

name: Workshop Assistant
oracle_text: When Workshop Assistant dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Sometimes the smallest things make the biggest difference.
